articles.title: Venice Film Festival: Abortion drama wins top prize
articles.description: Audrey Diwan's Happening is set in 1960s France but comes amid debate over strict new laws in Texas.
articles.content:
image captionThe winning film was directed by Audrey Diwan
A film about illegal abortions in 1960s France has won the top prize at the Venice Film Festival.
Audrey Diwan's Happening (L'Événement) i… [+1814 chars]

articles.title: America stops to remember 9/11
articles.description: Commemorations have taken place on the 20th anniversary of the 11 September attacks.
articles.content:
Commemorations have taken place on the 20th anniversary of the 11 September attacks.
A minute's silence was held at the exact time each hijacked plane crashed.
George W Bush, who was the US preside… [+134 chars]

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Families recite names of loved ones lost to 9/11
articles.description: On the 20th anniversary of the 9/11 attack, New York City held moments of silence for the lost 2,977 lives.
articles.content: On the 20th anniversary of the 9/11 attack, New York City held moments of silence for the lost 2,977 lives. A solemn bell tolled at 8:46 local time - when the hijacked Flight 11 hit the North Tower.

articles.content:
